Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bartholomew, Enemy, MainCharacter, Orvil, WizardLvl2
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
Class for creating moveable entity in the RenderWindow

    • Entity

      public Entity​(float m, float j, float h, int a, org.jsfml.system.Vector2f pos, org.jsfml.system.Vector2f s, org.jsfml.graphics.Texture[][] idle, org.jsfml.graphics.Texture[][] run, org.jsfml.graphics.Texture[][] attack, boolean c)
      Parameters:
      m - move speed
      j - jump speed
      h - health points
      a - attack strength
      pos - position
      s - size
      idle - paths to idle assets
      run - paths to run assets
      attack - paths to attack assets
